name: Knee-Deep in the Money: Episode 2
description: After the events of the first episode of Knee-Deep in the Money, Simon went missing. It was up to his loyal buddy to try and find him! This WAD contains some of the most epic gameplay ever in a Doom WAD. I ain't even joking around m8 this is serious. If you don't download this WAD then you must not appreciate genius work. So stop reading this and play the WAD already!
